title: Document all attributes and macros with examples

labels.name: C-cleanup
labels.description: Category: PRs that clean code up or issues documenting cleanup.

body:
`rust.md#attributes` and `rust.md#macros` document some attributes and macros, but give few examples. Also there are some attributes/macros missing.

Attributes:
- [x] abi  (already in rust.md; see commit 772028acdb229d1aaa5ac9ad670b276a218469a8)
- [x] allow (http://static.rust-lang.org/doc/master/rust.html#lint-check-attributes)
- [x] bench (delegated to #7824)
- [x] cfg (delegated to #7962)
- [x] deny (http://static.rust-lang.org/doc/master/rust.html#lint-check-attributes)
- [x] deriving (http://static.rust-lang.org/doc/master/rust.html#deriving)
- [x] doc (mentioned in commit 58807b05; delegated to #7963)
- [x] forbid (http://static.rust-lang.org/doc/master/rust.html#lint-check-attributes)
- [x] inline: src/libsyntax/attr.rs (delegated to #7959)
- [x] lang (handled by #3342; done; see comment dbeea18f )
- [x] license (delegated to #7961)
- [x] link (delegated to #7960; see commit d4c40b519b080a08a37d27e015083fd250fdd197)
- [x] link_args (delegated to #7960; see commit d4c40b519b080a08a37d27e015083fd250fdd197)
- [x] link_name (already in rust.md; see commit 772028acdb229d1aaa5ac9ad670b276a218469a8)
- [x] no_implicit_prelude, see #7844
- [x] nolink (delegated to #7960)
- [x] no_mangle (see librustc/middle/trans/base.rs)
- [x] no_std (see librustc/front/std_inject.rs)
- [x] path (done; see commit d4daa78a )
- [ ] should_fail (see librustc/front/test.rs)
- [x] start
- [x] static_assert (see librustc/middle/trans/base.rs)
- [x] test (delegated to #7824)
- [x] unsafe_destructor
- [x] warn (http://static.rust-lang.org/doc/master/rust.html#lint-check-attributes)

Macros:
- [x] asm http://static.rust-lang.org/doc/master/guide-unsafe.html#inline-assembly
- [x] assert http://static.rust-lang.org/doc/master/std/macros/macro.assert.html
- [x] assert_eq http://static.rust-lang.org/doc/master/std/macros/macro.assert_eq.html
- [x] cfg http://static.rust-lang.org/doc/master/std/macros/builtin/macro.cfg.html
- [ ] cold
- [x] concat_idents http://static.rust-lang.org/doc/master/std/macros/builtin/macro.concat_idents.html
- [x] bytes http://static.rust-lang.org/doc/master/std/macros/builtin/macro.bytes.html
- [x] debug (http://static.rust-lang.org/doc/master/std/logging/index.html)
- [x] env http://static.rust-lang.org/doc/master/std/macros/builtin/macro.env.html
- [x] error (http://static.rust-lang.org/doc/master/std/logging/index.html)
- [x] file (http://static.rust-lang.org/doc/master/rust.html#syntax-extensions)
- [x] format (http://static.rust-lang.org/doc/master/std/fmt/index.html)
- [x] include (https://github.com/mozilla/rust/blob/master/doc/rust.md#syntax-extensions)
- [x] include_bin (https://github.com/mozilla/rust/blob/master/doc/rust.md#syntax-extensions)
- [x] include_str (https://github.com/mozilla/rust/blob/master/doc/rust.md#syntax-extensions)
- [x] info (http://static.rust-lang.org/doc/master/std/logging/index.html)
- [x] line http://static.rust-lang.org/doc/master/std/macros/builtin/macro.line.html
- [x] log (http://static.rust-lang.org/doc/master/std/logging/index.html)
- [x] log_syntax
- [x] macro_rules
- [x] module_path http://static.rust-lang.org/doc/master/std/macros/builtin/macro.module_path.html
- [x] option_env http://static.rust-lang.org/doc/master/std/macros/builtin/macro.option_env.html
- [x] proto (is gone?)
- [ ] quote_expr
- [ ] quote_item
- [ ] quote_pat
- [ ] quote_stmt
- [ ] quote_tokens
- [ ] quote_ty
- [x] stringify (https://github.com/mozilla/rust/blob/master/doc/rust.md#syntax-extensions)
- [x] warn (http://static.rust-lang.org/doc/master/std/logging/index.html)
